00045 namespace network {
00046   namespace client {
00047     // generic base class for connecting to many broadcasters
00048     class client_multi_base : public  boost::enable_shared_from_this<client_multi_base>
00049                             , private boost::noncopyable {
00050     public:
00051       typedef boost::shared_ptr<client_multi_base> sptr;
00052     
00053       class connection_multi : public connection {
00054       public:
00055         typedef boost::shared_ptr<connection_multi> sptr;
00056         static sptr make(client_multi_base* that,
00057                          boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
00058                          std::string name,
00059                          std::string host,
00060                          std::string port) {
00061           return sptr(new connection_multi(that, io_service, name, host, port));
00062         }
00063 
00064         const std::string& name() const { return name_; }
00065 
00066         virtual void process(data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00067                              data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00068           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("process: h='%s', %s")
00069                        % header()
00070                        % name_));
00071           that_->process(this, begin, end);
00072         }
00073       
00074       protected:
00075       private:
00076         connection_multi(client_multi_base* that,
00077                          boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
00078                          std::string name,
00079                          std::string host,
00080                          std::string port)
00081           : connection(io_service, host, port)
00082           , that_(that)
00083           , name_(name) { }
00084     
00085         client_multi_base* that_;
00086         std::string        name_;
00087       } ;
00088   
00089       //                               (name, streams) -> connection
00090       typedef std::map<std::pair<std::string, std::string>, connection_multi::sptr> connection_map_type;
00091 
00092       // stream data object holding a copy of the received data + header
00093       class stream_data {
00094       public:
00095         typedef std::vector<char> data_vector_type;
00096         stream_data() {}
00097         stream_data(const protocol::header& h,
00098                     connection::data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00099                     connection::data_buffer_type::const_iterator end)
00100           : header_(h) {
00101           data_.resize(std::distance(begin, end));
00102           std::copy(begin, end, data_.begin());
00103         }
00104         const protocol::header& header() const { return header_; }
00105         const data_vector_type& data()   const { return data_; }
00106       protected:
00107       private:
00108         protocol::header header_;
00109         data_vector_type data_;
00110       } ;
00111 
00112       typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00113       typedef std::multimap<ptime, stream_data > time_data_type;
00114       typedef std::map<std::string, time_data_type >   name_time_data_type;
00115       typedef std::map<std::pair<ptime, ptime>, name_time_data_type > history_buffer_type;
00116 
00117       client_multi_base(boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
00118                         const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00119         : strand_(io_service)
00120         , mutex_(new boost::mutex)
00121         , now_(boost::posix_time::not_a_date_time)
00122         , time_granularity_sec_(config.get<size_t>("ClientMulti.<xmlattr>.time_granularity_sec"))
00123         , delay_(boost::posix_time::seconds(config.get<size_t>("ClientMulti.<xmlattr>.synchronization_delay_sec"))) {
00124 
00125         // make sure that the time granularity divides the number of seconds in a day
00126         ASSERT_THROW(((24*60*60) % time_granularity_sec_) == 0);
00127 
00128         // make up the list of connections
00129         BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type& p, config.get_child("ClientMulti.Servers")) {
00130           if (p.first == "<xmlattr>") continue;
00131           ASSERT_THROW(p.first == "Server");
00132           std::string streams;
00133           BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type& s, p.second) {
00134             if (s.first == "<xmlattr>") continue;
00135             ASSERT_THROW(s.first == "Stream");
00136             streams += " " + s.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.pattern");
00137           }
00138           connect_to(p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"),
00139                      p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.host"),
00140                      p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.port"),
00141                      streams);
00142         }
00143       }
00144       virtual ~client_multi_base() {}
00145   
00146       void connect_to(std::string name, std::string host, std::string port, std::string streams) {
00147         connection_multi::sptr c(connection_multi::make(this, io_service(), name, host, port));
00148         connections_.insert(std::make_pair(std::make_pair(name, streams), c));
00149       }
00150 
00151       // start all connections
00152       void start() {
00153         BOOST_FOREACH(connection_map_type::value_type& cv, connections_) {
00154           cv.second->start(cv.first.second);
00155         }
00156       }
00157       boost::asio::io_service& io_service() { return strand_.get_io_service(); }  
00158       boost::asio::strand&     strand()     { return strand_; }  
00159   
00160     protected:
00161       // this method is called by the connected clients to send data
00162       void process(connection_multi* c,
00163                    connection::data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00164                    connection::data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00165         boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> lock(*mutex_); // protects the code below
00166 
00167         //  data id : name + stream_name
00168         const std::string name(c->name()+"_"+c->directory().stream_name_of(c->header().stream_number()));
00169         const ptime t(c->header().approx_ptime());
00170 
00171         // ignore data which is too old
00172         if (!history_.empty()) {
00173           const ptime oldest_ptime(history_.begin()->first.first);
00174           if (t < oldest_ptime) { // ignore this data as it is too old
00175             std::cout << "ignoring data: " << t << " < " << oldest_ptime << std::endl;
00176             return;
00177           }
00178         }
00179 
00180         // initialize (first call)
00181         if (now_ == boost::posix_time::not_a_date_time)
00182           now_ = t;
00183 
00184         // update the clock
00185         if (c->header().approx_ptime() > now_)
00186           now_ = t;
00187 
00188         // make the time interval according to the time granularity
00189         const long sec_of_day(t.time_of_day().total_seconds());
00190         const std::pair<ptime, ptime> time_interval
00191           (std::make_pair
00192            (ptime(t.date(), boost::posix_time::seconds(time_granularity_sec_*(sec_of_day/time_granularity_sec_))),
00193             ptime(t.date(), boost::posix_time::seconds(time_granularity_sec_*(sec_of_day/time_granularity_sec_ + 1)))));
00194 
00195         std::cout << "now,t,interval= " << now_ << " "
00196                   << t << " [" << time_interval.first << "," << time_interval.second << "]" << std::endl;
00197       
00198         // insert the data (copy)
00199         time_data_type& mm(history_[time_interval][name]);
00200         mm.insert(time_data_type::value_type(t, stream_data(c->header(), begin, end)));
00201 
00202         // process and erase all those intervals which are too old
00203         const ptime newest_ptime(history_.rbegin()->first.second);
00204         for (history_buffer_type::iterator i(history_.begin()); i!=history_.end(); ) {
00205           std::cout << " --- [" << i->first.first << "," << i->first.second
00206                     << "] newest time: " << newest_ptime
00207                     << " number of names: " << i->second.size() << std::endl;
00208           if (newest_ptime - i->first.first > delay_) {
00209             // process all data for this interval
00210             std::cout << " --- * processing data for interval= " << i->first.first << "," << i->first.second << std::endl;      
00211             history_.erase(i++);
00212           } else {
00213             ++i;
00214           }
00215         }
00216       }
00217 
00218     private:
00219       boost::asio::strand              strand_;
00220       connection_map_type              connections_;          // connection information
00221       boost::shared_ptr<boost::mutex>  mutex_;                // protectes the process method
00222       ptime                            now_;                  // current time = newest time of all received data
00223       history_buffer_type              history_;              // holds data received from servers
00224       size_t                           time_granularity_sec_; // in seconds
00225       boost::posix_time::time_duration delay_;                // time delay for synchronization
00226     } ;
00227 
00228   } // namespace client
00229 } // namespace network
00230 #endif // _CLIENT_MULTI_BASE_HPP_cm140509_
